attributes.action: to persuade current account providers to release there charging structures on unauthorised overdraft charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The undersigned  would like the Prime Minister Tony Blair and the Head of State Her noble Majesty Queen Elizabeth the second to support our petition.

Petition as follows 

Current account providers are breaching the unfair terms in Schedule 2(e) of the Unfair Terms in Consumer Contracts Regulation 1999

We would like the above named individuals to support this petition to persuade current account providers to release there charging structures on unauthorised overdraft charges.

rejection.details: petitions on this subject already exist
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
